it.polimi.se2018.model

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.utils.Observable
      • it.polimi.se2018.model.Game

  • public class Game
extends Observable
    Main class of the Model. An instance of this class represent a specific real game going on on the server. This class implements the OBSERVER PATTERN in order to notify all the Views connected.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(int numberOfRounds,
            int maxNumberOfPlayers)
        Constructor for a new Game instance. Basic configuration is passed as argument. Cards will be assigned later.
        Parameters:
        numberOfRounds - the number of rounds the game is composed of
        maxNumberOfPlayers - the maximum number of players that the game can have

      • getToolCard

        public ToolCard getToolCard(ToolCard toolCardCopy)
        Gets the toolCard in the model that corresponds to the passed shallow copy.
        Parameters:
        toolCardCopy - the toolCard shallow copy.
        Returns:
        the actual toolCard from the drawnToolCards, or null if no such card is found.

      • nextRound

        public void nextRound(java.util.List<Dice> dices)
               throws NoMoreRoundsAvailableException
        Proceed the game going to the next round (if available).
        Parameters:
        dices - the dices that are drafted from the dicebag for the new round
        Throws:
        NoMoreRoundsAvailableException - if the method is called but all the rounds that could have been played in this game were actually already played
